Name: Naresh
AboutMe:
I am very interested in Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Image Processing, Computer Graphics and Medical Imaging. I’ve completed several projects and participated in technical symposiums related to these fields.

In the past I’ve worked as an intern at Aurangabad Electricals Ltd. and at Krishna Institute of Medical sciences. I’ve participated/am participating in challenges at Kaggle.com, and have participated in ImagineCup Kinect FunLabs challenge.

I am currently working on a R-Hex prototype. My work involves all aspects of the prototype, including physical design, control,vision,path-planning, manufacturing, software coding/hardware interfacing, sensor caliberation and purchasing.
